listing.street_address: Old Dalkeith Road, Danderhall, Dalkeith, EH22 1FD

opening_hours.note: Minor variations exist across sources; some sources indicate Friday closing at 22:30 and weekend closing at 09:00. Recommend verification with venue.

listing.summary: David Lloyd Club Edinburgh Shawfair is a premium health and fitness facility located in Danderhall, south-east Edinburgh, opened in August 2023. The club features a 100+ station gym, 20m indoor and 25m outdoor heated pools, 12 indoor and 7 outdoor tennis courts plus a 4-court aerodome, 3 padel courts, and a luxury spa retreat with Himalayan salt sauna, steam room, and plunge pool. With 100+ weekly classes across 4 studios, crèche facilities, kids' clubs, and on-site dining, it serves families and fitness enthusiasts across Midlothian and East Lothian.

source_info.note: Comprehensive data extracted from official David Lloyd sources (Grade A), secondary venue listings and press releases (Grade B), and member reviews/local news (Grade C). entity.amenities_summary: The club includes a large restaurant-quality clubroom with freshly cooked meals, café, business lounge for remote work, outdoor patio dining, free Wi-Fi throughout, modern changing facilities with showers, lockers, equipment shop, and the Battlebox outdoor training facility.
entity.tennis_summary: The club features 23 tennis courts in total: 12 indoor courts, 7 outdoor courts, and 4 courts within a covered aerodome for all-weather play. Expert tennis coaching is available at various levels.
entity.swimming_summary: The club offers a 20m heated indoor pool and 25m heated outdoor pool with aqua aerobics, family swim times, adult swim sessions, and swimming lessons for both adults and children.
entity.family_summary: The club features dedicated family facilities including a crèche, daily kids' club with activities, kids' sports programs (swimming lessons, tennis coaching, Lego Squad), kids' classes (Rebels BLAZE and Rebels Battlebox for ages 8+), family dining area with indoor playframe, outdoor playground, and holiday clubs.
entity.gym_summary: The 100+ station gym features cardio machines (treadmills, cross trainers, upright bikes, Wattbikes), free weights, cable machines, Hammer Strength equipment, Life Fitness cardio, EGYM Smart Strength machines, and a dedicated stretching and recovery zone with Body Hub for BioAge testing and metabolic tracking.
entity.padel_summary: Three outdoor padel courts are available, with some sources indicating covered facilities.
entity.parking_and_transport_summary: Free parking for 250 vehicles on-site with disabled parking spaces. Located just off the Edinburgh City Bypass (A720) for easy access. Shawfair Railway Station is approximately 1 mile north (9-minute walk) on the Borders Railway line. Bus routes 33, 48, and 51 serve the area with stops within 4-10 minutes' walk.
entity.classes_summary: The club offers 100+ classes weekly across 4 bespoke studios, including signature David Lloyd classes (BLAZE HIIT, IGN1TE martial arts HIIT, SPIRIT yoga/Pilates/meditation, Cyclone group cycling) plus standard offerings: yoga, Pilates, strength training, cardio, Zumba, aqua aerobics, and core stability.
entity.spa_summary: The Spa Retreat features a Himalayan Salt Sauna (indoor and outdoor), Crystal Steam Room with bespoke aromatherapy, heated spa pool, plunge pool, ice cave, scented spa showers, and heated beds for relaxation.
entity.reviews_summary: The club receives strong ratings (4.6 stars) with members praising excellent facilities, friendly staff, luxurious spa, and clean modern environment. Early 2024 criticisms included overcrowding during peak times, parking difficulties, long spa queues, app reliability issues, and perceived overpricing of food.
